com.avaya.ic.sdk
Interface ChatMediaInteractionRecord

All Superinterfaces:
CustomerHistoryRecord, MediaInteractionRecord, NameValueList
public interface ChatMediaInteractionRecord
extends MediaInteractionRecord

Represents a record of a historical chat interaction that a customer had with the contact center.

Nested Class Summary
static class ChatMediaInteractionRecord.Operation
           
static class ChatMediaInteractionRecord.RequestTranscriptResponse
          The Client SDK fires this event after the Transcript has been received from the server.
 
Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.avaya.ic.sdk.CustomerHistoryRecord
CustomerHistoryRecord.RequestWorkItemHistoryResponse, CustomerHistoryRecord.RequestWrapupRecordsResponse
 
Method Summary
 java.lang.String getTranscript()
          Get The Transcript that was generated by the chat interaction between the customer and one or more users in the contact center.
 void requestTranscript()
          Requests the Transcript from the server.
 
Methods inherited from interface com.avaya.ic.sdk.CustomerHistoryRecord
getWorkItemHistory, getWrapupRecords, requestWorkItemHistory, requestWrapupRecords
 
Methods inherited from interface com.avaya.ic.sdk.NameValueList
addNameValue, getNameValue, getNameValues, removeNameValue
 

Method Detail

getTranscript

java.lang.String getTranscript()
Get The Transcript that was generated by the chat interaction between the customer and one or more users in the contact center. The Transcript is not available until you call requestTranscript on the ChatMediaInteractionRecord. The Transcript is an XML document

Returns:
The Transcript that was generated by the chat interaction between the customer and one or more users in the contact center. The Transcript is not available until you call requestTranscript on the ChatMediaInteractionRecord. The Transcript is an XML document

requestTranscript

void requestTranscript()
Requests the Transcript from the server. After the Transcript is received from the server, the client SDK fires the RequestTranscriptResponse event.
